actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an exemption from the highway use tax in the case of certain trucks and other vehicles which are used primarily for hauling unprocessed farm and forest products from their place of production to market or mill.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt highway vehicles from the highway use tax where 80 percent of their use is involved in the initial transportation of unprocessed farm and forest products.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an exemption from the highway use tax in the case of certain trucks and other vehicles which are used primarily for hauling unprocessed farm and forest products from their place of production to market or mill.
